actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: Commending the National Student Leadership Conference for organizing college campus experiences for high school students for more than 20 years.

summary.text:
Commends the National Student Leadership Conference for working for more than 20 years toward providing high school students with enhanced educational experiences.

 Encourages the expansion of such efforts throughout this country and the world.

titles.title: Commending the National Student Leadership Conference for organizing college campus experiences for high school students for more than 20 years.
